response.overview: A lonely man late one night suddenly receives phone calls from strangers. Some of them eerily warning him to stay in the light and another taunting him about someone coming to take him away. He at first dismisses these stranger's warnings but as the night and the calls relentlessly continue, his apartment lights begin to go out, one by one.
response.tagline: Aren't you going to let them in?
response.title: Is Someone There?
